titles.title: A concurrent resolution affirming the importance of a national day of prayer and fasting, and expressing the sense of Congress that March 17, 2003, should be designated as a national day of prayer and fasting.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that March 17, 2003, should be designated as a day for humility, prayer, and fasting for all people of the United States.
